Comment:
Я чувствую себя виноватым, когда понимаю, что считаю материальные вещи
важнее, чем забота о родственниках. я чувствую очень
эгоцентричный.

மற்றும் அவரது பாத்திரத்தின் எதிர்மறை பக்கங்களை உண்மையில் கொண்டு வந்தது

Als ich auf einen Baum kletterte, um Äpfel zu pflücken. Der Winkel der Leiter
Ich war eingeschaltet und konnte nicht hoch genug kommen. Dies implizierte

đã được trang bị và có một cái gì đó trong đó.
Ich habe eine Prüfung bestanden, bei der ich absolut sicher war, dass ich nicht bestanden hatte.

Quand je n'ai pas pu trouver ma fille de 2 ans. J'ai couru et regardé

Quando sono stato fermato da poliziotti in borghese perché l'auto mi

Même si c'était prévu, je me sentais toujours déprimé.

Un paio di anni fa, durante le vacanze estive, stavo pescando
un lago con mio marito. All'improvviso ha iniziato a piovere mentre il
il sole splendeva ancora. Ho provato una sensazione di gioia, felicità

我独自一人在家，躺在床上读一本女性杂志，
有超自然经验的故事。我的腿是
发痒，我伸手抓挠，我感到另一
奇怪的手。 （后来我意识到那是
毯）

听说我的前任上司去世了，后来我在
在报纸上读到有关此事的首页，我想到了我们的
互动以及如何不再可行。范围有限
人的生命是可悲的。

В трамвае передо мной стояла толстая, болезненного вида женщина
кто спрашивал дорогу хриплым голосом. Когда она встала
от нее исходил отвратительный запах мочи. Я чувствовал что я
задохнется.

Ich machte meiner Schwester eine Bemerkung über ihre Einstellung zu Männern
So sprach sie und ich verglich sie mit einer Bekannten von mir.
Später, am selben Abend, sah meine Schwester traurig aus. ich fühlte mich schuldig
über ihre Traurigkeit.

Une fois, je suis arrivé avec deux heures de retard sur mon lieu de travail (une banque) et j'étais

Mir wurde ganz unerwartet gesagt, dass man wollte, dass ich der werde
stellvertretender Vorsitzender unserer Studentenorganisation. Ich war wirklich
überrascht und Freude war die erste Emotion, die ich fühlte, obwohl dahinter
Es gab Sorgen - wie soll ich Erfolg haben?

Unsere Tutorial-Gruppe sollte bald geteilt werden, und wir bekamen eine Liste von
Namen von Neulingen, von denen fünf in meiner Gruppe sein sollten. Wir
Lesen Sie die Namen und dann ging jede Gruppe ihren eigenen Weg zu einem Seminar
Zimmer. Ich fragte mich, wie ich mit der neuen Situation umgehen würde und ob
Ich würde als Gruppenleiter erfolgreich sein.

Estábamos en una discoteca y la velada no fue nada agradable.
A pesar de no saber por qué, estaba enojado con mi compañero. Yo dejo
siente mi mal humor porque no puedo ocultar mis sentimientos.

Mi abuela murió y mi madre me llamó un domingo por la mañana.
en el otoño. La forma en que mi madre me lo contó, la odiaba
en ese momento. Sonaba como si hubiera estado esperando el
muerte de mi abuela. Había perdido a una persona cercana a mí. yo
También me sentí culpable porque había sido malo con mi abuela últimamente. No había
se mantuvo tranquila cuando ya no entendía todo tan bien.

मैं अपनी पढ़ाई से संबंधित एक कार्य से चिंतित था जो होना था
दो के समूहों में किया। मैं अपने दोस्तों से इसके बारे में बात कर रहा था
मैंने कहा, कुछ नकारात्मक, एक तरह से अचानक, मेरे विषय में
काम साथी। मैंने जो कहा, उसका मुझे कोई मतलब नहीं था और मुझे लगा
शर्म की बात है कि वह उसकी आलोचना करने के लिए पर्याप्त है

Quand j'étais enfant, on a découvert que j'avais enlevé mon

[வசந்த சூரிய ஒளியில் சைக்கிள் ஓட்டுவது எனக்கு அத்தகைய மகிழ்ச்சியைத் தருகிறது.

coche. Otro coche intentó empujar delante de mi padre y estaba

When my grandfather was sick, and died I felt more sad, though,  
when he was sick.

Eating too much I felt guilty afterwards because I knew I  
shouldn't have overeaten as I'm putting on too much weight.

When my last year's second semester results came through - I was  
ecstatic.

I was sleeping in my room but woke in the middle of the night to  
think I could hear noises and see shadows moving. I felt that  
someone was in the house.

I felt very sad when I had to give up something that by right was  
mine and although I didn't get it, a kind of suvenir that people  
don't give you the right to have.
When I was reproved eighth grade of high school.
The loss of the woman who loved me most till today.

On a telephone talk where I was agressive and stupid without the  
least, reason or better motive.

When I succeed in writing something I felt and doing it I felt  
well and very happy for being able to express to myself something  
that was suffocating me.

When somebody suddenly said something (about me) at a wrong  
moment and I didn't agree (at that exact moment I was needing an  
extremely positive word).

Once I spoke without thinking very much - it was quite a  
nonsense.

My sister had promised to help me to do a translation from  
English into German. But the day I needed her she told me that  
she was busy - I was very angry.

Several years ago my mother died. She had been ill for a long  
time, but nevertheless her death came unexpectedly. I did not and  
I still do not want to believe that it is true.

I came home from a party rather drunk. I said things I would  
never have said normally. Next morning I was terribly ashamed  
about what I had said.

I had a little cat which was very sick. As I liked it very much I  
went to a veterinary with it. He told me how to tend it and it  
really recovered its health. Everybody said that I had saved its  
life.

When I was on a cave excursion with friends, I suddenly lost them  
and was afraid of losing my way in the cave.
When I had a Latin examination in school.

A friend was unpunctual, we wanted to prepare ourselves for an  
examination.
When my grandparents moved to another part of the town.

On my birthday, an old friend of mine sent me a card. I had not  
met him for a year and I was very glad that he had thought of me.

Once I spent a night with a friend at the secondary school. We  
told each other horror stories and suddenly we heard uncanny  
noises. I was terribly frightened.

When I attended school, our class visited an institution for  
mentally and physically handicapped persons. Although I tried to  
control my feelings, I was disgusted.

I had to take care of a neighbour's child. I did not look after  
it all the time and the child fell down and was hurt. I felt  
guilty.

At a party I met a girl who drew me to her, told me some nonsense  
and always wanted to kiss me.

Several days after my final examination at school, I was sitting  
in an airplane on my way to Greece. I enjoyed that moment very  
much.

I had arranged with a friend to go with him to Carinthia by car.  
We had arranged a place where to meet. I was a bit late and my  
friend had left already. I had no money to go by train. I nearly  
started to cry because I was so angry - it was very important for  
me to go to Carinthia.

When we were playing, I hurt my little sister, but towards my  
mother I did not admit that it was my fault.

During a discussion I reacted very aggressively and so I made it  
impossible to continue discussing.

When I am discussing something with a person and I realize that  
the other person is thinking over her own argumentations instead  
of listening, I become angry.

When we were on holidays my girl-friend had to leave me after 4  
weeks and I had to stay in Turkey for some more weeks because I  
had a job there.

I studied medicine for several semesters. I was always disgusted  
when we had the dissecting-course. I cannot understand why some  
persons like this course.

On New Year's Eve I went in a disco with friends. I amused myself  
and got to know many other people.

I was very hungry and just wanted to start eating when a friend  
called me who usually talks for a long time. I was angry because  
I was prevented from eating.

A teacher wanted to instill a certain opinion and a certain  
behaviour into myself, what I refused. I was afraid when I saw  
him.
A man whom I like, was drunk and tried to molest me.

On my 18th birthday I passed the driving-test. I was glad because  
I had had to study very much, because I had been lucky and  
because - as a proof that it was really difficult - not everybody  
had passed the test.

At about midnight I had to go by bike through Graz alone. On the  
whole it was a distance of several kilometers. A car followed me  
through the streets. Only when I went into a one-way street the  
car disappeared. The rest of my way home I was very afraid.

I had cared for a horse for 2 years. One day it was sold and I  
cried for several days because I was so sad.

A friend of mine was telling jokes which I felt to be very  
disgusting, especially because I was eating.

At a carneval-party I smooched with a man - some days later I was  
rather ashamed for that.

Many years ago I saw the film "Psycho" by Hitchcock for the first  
time. When I saw the film I was alone and afterwards I hardly  
dared to go to bed and hardly was able to sleep.

I had been together with my boy-friend for two and a half years,  
when he got to know another girl and not even tried to conceal  
that from me. I drew my conclusions and left him - I also felt a  
bit guilty for what had happened.

I studied medicine for several semesters and at that time I  
developed a great fear of examinations. I was most afraid of my  
examination of anatomy. While other students were examined, I was  
dissecting. I was able to hear everything and was waiting with  
fear until it was my turn.

When I bought new skis; I was ashamed to tell the assistant that  
I am not good at skiing and therefor bought racing skis.

I thought that I had failed an examination, but when I was  
informed about the mark, I saw that I had passed it.

Before an examination: I had the fealing that I had not learned  
enough.

Once when I was playing table tennis I was already sure that I  
would win , but at last I lost the game.

I had an appointment with a friend. I promised him to meet with  
him, but at last I did not without having informed him.

When I had a psychical crisis, I met a girl, who told me that she  
had had almost the same problems and how she had finally overcome  
them.

With a group of handicapped people we went to a party. When we  
wanted to leave we were not able to find one of these people. I  
had told his mother that we would leave at 4.30 p.m., actually it  
was planned for 3.30 p.m. Therefore there was a delay.

After my boy-friend had beaten me for the first time, I always  
trembled when somebody knocked on my door or when I heard steps  
coming nearer.

I had not eaten anything for 2 days to be able to pay the fine  
for my fiancT. But he stayed in another town and spent one  
thousand shillings in the restaurant during the same time.

I bought an aquarium which made me much pleasure. I was watching  
the fish when my father came in and asked me how much I had payed  
for it. He said he would not pay for the current that it would  
require.

When I was 9 years old, I got a cat, but after 3 days he died. I  
was very sad, because I had nursed him and taken him to the  
veterinary's - but in vain. Although I had had him only for a  
short time I had liked him very much.

My sisters asked me to fetch them at a discotheque which is 5 km  
off. There was a thick fog and snowfall. There was not enough  
room in the car for all of them and they asked me to go there  
once again. When I did not do that they had a way to make me feel  
guilty.

When I heard that I had passed my final examination at school  
(with success).
Before my final examination.
When my father died.

My girl-friend did not understand me; I was angry with myself  
because I had problems when we seperated - I could not resign  
myself to it.

When I was in the army, we got a certain dish for dinner that I  
do not like at all. We were not obliged to eat, but I was very  
hungry.

A friend who was 22 years old, died of leukemia; I had not known  
that he was so ill and therefore had not cared.
I had an accident with damage to the car body.

I heard friends grumbling at me in an adjoining room, although  
they had behaved in a friendly way when I was present.

I read about a murderer who brutalized his victims by cutting  
open their stomaches and taking out their bowels.

My friend came to see me after she had stayed abroad. I waited at  
the station.

At an office an application that I had made was turned down  
because of a scrupulous interpretation of the rules.

I went to fetch my girl-friend at the station. When the train  
arrived and I saw her descending and running up to me, I felt  
glad.

When I wanted to go into a house, there was suddenly a big dog  
standing beside me. It was hardly moving, but I did not know how  
it would react later on.

During a discussion I said something rather stupid and  
unnecessary.

My boy-friend had promised me to come an 10 a.m. - he was 3 hours  
late.

When I broke the piggy bank of my brother and my mother  
discovered that.

A friend had promised me to give me a lift to Graz. To be sure I  
called her before we went. She told me that she had just promised  
another person to give him a lift.
Boyfriend "chatting up" another girl.

Accidentally seeing a friend in a compromising situation with a  
stranger.
Movement in bush late at night while camping.
Caused fault in V.C.R. by not following instructions carefully.

A girlfriend ended our relationship in an abrupt and unexpected  
manner.

A friend once reacted childishly (he is 23 yearrs old) to my not  
responding in his favour to a request, that is: he asked me for  
some money I refused, and his reaction was quite childish.

Being stopped by the police for a traffic offence which I don't  
think I committed.
Death of a parent.

While walking through an old mining area, I unwittingly disturbed  
a wallaby which, in its resultant flight, accidentally fell down  
a deep mine shaft. On investigation it seemed uninjured, but it  
was impossible for the wallaby to get out, and also for me to get  
it out of the shaft. To prevent its suffering a slow death, I  
shot it.

A colleague and I were sitting on a bench next to an old man in a  
shopping centre. the old man coughed and spluttered somewhat,  
then with his fingers removed the resultant phlegm and mucous  
from his mouth, and transferred it onto the armrest of the  
bench.

When I found out that a person I went to school with had died in  
a car accident.

When I heard about the way a parent of a friend had mistreated  
him, and caused a great instability.
Often I forget to give my immediate family birthday presents.
As for disgust.

I realised that someone was insidiously attempting to shit me off  
I was disgusted with him for doing so, because I afforded him  
with no excuse to do so.

I cannot recall feeling guilty in the near past.
REMARK - SUBJECT MAY NOT HAVE TAKEN THE EXERCISE VERY SERIOUSLY.
The death of my twin sister - suicide.

I had been rude to my mother at a time when she needed  
comforting, not anger (death of my sister).

I was alone in my parents' house, having made plans to spend the  
afternoon with a lover (plans which the lover cancelled),  
watching a movie and considering my life and circumstances -  
pressures of examinations in particular.
Blank.

The mother of a person with whom we had been sharing a housing  
accused me of trying to rip her off over payment of bills in the  
house.

When my boyfriend last told me he loved me after I gave him an  
impulsive kiss.

I feel shame every time I think of very dear friends of mine  
abroad who were family to me for a year, and now 2 years later, I  
have attempted, but have not actually gone through with  
corresponding with them, to express my feelings and gratitude.

When I thought that my high school love and I had a mutual  
emotion.

I was on my surf ski. Rather large waves to strong current  
separated me from my ski and we both began to drift slowly  
(actually rather quickly) away to sea. The direction I was  
drifting in was taking me straight over a reef on which rather  
large sharks were constantly being caught. (I was alone with no  
one to help me).
When my father revealed inconsistent morals.

My brother and I were driving to Brisbane when he drove back onto  
the road, perhaps cutting off another car but not noticeable -  
this driver did his best to drive us off the road for about 1/2  
an hour.

My mother died of cancer after a 4 year illness - I think the  
most pregnant moment of sadness was the next morning, just as the  
sun rose.

I was walking outside the union refec after rain when I tripped  
and fell.

At rejection / being ignored by a loved person held in great  
esteem.

Following heavy stirring / ridiculing a close friend who was  
very vulnerable to such attack - inspiring fierce, defensive  
counter-attack.

Guilt at having pressed another person to expose/explore his  
personal weaknesses/faults, to the extent that the other person  
was made to feel terrible/defensive.

I walked in on a teenage patient of mine (I work in a hospital)  
as he was going through my office drawers and he had removed  
money from my purse.
Death of grandmother.

At the funeral of a friend about 20 years old, who was killed in  
a hit-and-run motorcycle accident.

I wasn't able to see my girlfriend on her birthday and because I  
was late arriving home from uni, I didn't phone her as arranged  
at a certain time (she rang in the meantime).
A situation where I stole a friends wife's wallet.

When at school, I threw a duster at another child and hit him in  
the head. The blow caused a flesh wound and I was afraid of what  
would happen to me when the teacher found out the circumstances.

Finding that a subordinate at work was still not willing to  
cooperate after discussions to try and resolve an attitude  
problem.

No specific instances - perhaps having lied as a child resulting  
in someone else being blamed for the event.

When my best friend foud out I'd been lying about something I'd  
been doing behind her back.

After training for an Australian championship competition for a  
year and then injuring myself 2 weeks before the competiotion.

I was captain of the school swimming team. The team was only two  
points in front before the last relay. We won the relay, which I  
swam in, and thus my team won the championship.

Shifted from Melbourne to Brisbane. All my old school friends  
gave me a party and I had to say good-bye to them all.

Was picking up my father from work and on passing through the  
Valley watched three prostitutes walk up and down waiting for  
someone to pick them up. Clothing was disgusting.

Guilt after fighting with my sister (for) telling her how bad she  
was.

When my mother and father split up I was angry: I felt deprived  
and "different" from other children at school.

When I heard that one of my good friends, when at a party, had  
got herself involved with some very undesirable characters and  
was experimenting with drugs.
Day I received my T.E. score and acceptance into my chosen course.

When my mother asked me to do a job for her which does not  
require much effort on my part, yet I refused for selfish reasons  
and saw her have to do it.

A friend of mine is having psychiatric problems because of his  
mother's death ages ago. He is really quiet and because it  
relates back to his childhood I feel sadness for him. He doesn't  
lead a normal life and it just seems unfair.

Getting a good mark for a subject I had worked hard at but  
expected only a moderate mark.
My father died last year after an 8-week severe illness.

I was walking quite quickly and unthinking through a children's  
playground, when a toddler ran in front of me I knocked him over  
and he hit his head quite hard and began crying.
Getting slightly intoxicated at the 1984 I.C.C. Ball.

I felt guilty about going out when I should have been studying  
for a presentation I had to give on Wednesday the next week.

When I received the results from my final examination - Higher  
School Certificate - and received a mark that was beyond my  
wildest expectations.

At my father, when he yelled and accused my sister's friend (over  
the phone) of doing something he didn't do, or know anything  
about.
Got through first semester University.

A situation where I ignored my beliefs and principles for a trip  
of whimsy.

I bacame involved with a boy for a very brief moment not because  
I liked him but because I needed some sort of company. The  
consequences weren't as I expected and caused me much shame.
Ignoring my parents'wishes.
When I was accused of "bitching" about best friend.
At a night club watching little tarts trying to earn a living.

When I was little - Mum caught me telling a lie about who broke  
the cup.
When my father died.

When I have seen people very drunk and making fools of  
themselves.
Quand mes amis étaient impolis avec une fille.
Cuando fui grosero con mi madre y me enojé con ella.

When my present boyfriend asked me initially to go out with him I  
had waited a long time for this to occur.

When my sister lost my favourite jumper at a party and failed to  
tell me for several days after it happened.

Khi tôi nói với em gái tôi rằng tôi đã ngủ với bạn trai của tôi, và cô ấy ở
đầu tiên là giận tôi, sau đó tôi cảm thấy xấu hổ vì hành động này, nhưng không
cảm giác tội lỗi.
I allowed my then boyfriend to touch me, if only briefly.

当我看到我的兄弟在教堂里并公开接受耶稣
基督是他的救主和主。

When I saw a male engineer one year and came back to find he was  
now a female (I don't know it/them personally).

Khi bố tham dự Ngày hội thể thao và là phụ huynh duy nhất ở đó, và
anh ấy đã cổ vũ cho chúng tôi.

We owned a shop and I used to serve in it occasionally. We  
sometimes took lollies out of the stand and Dad caught me one  
day.

On holidays - just driving along a road beautiful scenery. Just  
with my boyfriend - not really talking but just feeling  
overwhelmed.
Good news about a sick relative.
暗闇の中で一人歩き。

When I received my TE Score and my acceptance from University -  
it had been a goal since I left the bank a year earlier.

Мы с младшим братом поссорились из-за ТВ / Видео. Он

слушал мой авторитет и вел себя дерзко. Мы ссорились и я
заплакал - победил.
When my new jeans split while I was with the youth group.

When I was 17, I told Mum I came in at midnight, when really it  
was 3.30.

Не могу вспомнить конкретное событие - кроме того, что умеренно
счастлив, пока год или около того назад.
Left alone in dark when young.
Can't remember exact example.
When I was left by the person I loved without any reason.

An einem Tag, als ich aus der Dusche kam, deckte ich nur die ab
Vorderteil meines Körpers mit einem Handtuch (ich war 7 Jahre alt) und ich
Ich habe nicht gesehen, dass mein Cousin im Zimmer war.

I felt it when I received a letter telling that I had been  
classified in a national concourse of p... I felt happy and  
vanity about it.

I felt fear when once I was asleep and dreamed that I was dying  
asfixiated by a cardiac attack, I was afraid and woke up  
desperate. Altough I wasn't afraid of death I was afraid.

யாரோ ஒரு முட்டாள் செய்ய முயற்சிக்கிறார்கள் என்று பார்க்கும்போது நான் அதை உணர்கிறேன்
என்னை.
여자 친구에게 결혼 해달라고했을 때.

I was with my girlfriend when some guys that I don't like made  
fuss at my girl.

एक लंच में मेरी प्रेमिका के साथ लड़ाई में जहां हर कोई
मुझे इस तरह घूरता रहा कि मुझे इसे छोड़ना पड़ा।
我指出我的一个朋友失败了。
When I met a friend that I hadn't seen for some time.
Когда я попал в джунгли, где было множество змей.
I confused a girl with another.

Once when I complained I caused a great discussion between my  
parents.

Once as a school girl I was copying at a class work and my  
teacher spotted me.

我在疗养院。在我面前，一个男孩从他的身上摔下来

Quand je me suis séparé de l'homme que j'aimais tant.
When my friend (girl) went abroad for two years.
Khi ai đó bị buộc tội hoặc bị trừng phạt thay vì tôi.
நான் பல்கலைக்கழகத்தில் அனுமதிக்கப்பட்டேன், எனக்கு ஒரு மருமகள் பிறந்தார்.
I was bitten by a dog.
मेरे बारे में एक अन्यायपूर्ण विपत्ति।
Le mentí a un amigo.
퀸즐랜드 체스 챔피언십 우승.

Promettere a qualcuno di fare il proprio lavoro e poi non poterlo fare

Получил очень личное письмо от девушки, которая мне нравится, которая

Me présentant lors d'un premier tutoriel cette année à l'université.

एक बच्चे के रूप में - एक कठोर नाखून पर कदम रखना - बताया जा रहा है कि मैं हो सकता है
टेटनस प्राप्त करें।
As a child - having a dog - it getting a disease and dying.

ஒரு மலேசிய நகரத்தில் என் காதலியுடன் வெளியே வருவது a

நோய்வாய்ப்பட்ட மனிதன் செல்ல முயன்றான். அவள் டாக்ஸியை எடுத்துக்கொள்வதைப் பார்த்தாள்.

En tant qu'enfant - marcher accidentellement sur un cochon d'Inde - il

说些很不礼貌，但开玩笑地说

è stato trovato scomparso prima che potessi fare qualcosa, nessuno lo ha ammesso

जब मैं एक बच्चा था, मेरी प्यारी बिल्ली ने चार सुंदर को जन्म दिया

जब मेरे भाई मेरे प्रेमी के प्रति क्रूर हो रहे थे, क्योंकि उसके

Antes de que Uni comenzara, tuve que salir de casa y fijarme en

Uni에서 일주일 후 집으로 돌아온 첫 번째 주말

우리 가족과 함께.

जन्म देने की खुशी, और मेरे पति के साथ उस खुशी को साझा करना।

출산 후 나를 치료하는 의사에게 분노합니다.

정신과 치료가 필요했고 저를 지원하지 않습니다.
恥ずかしくて覚えられない。

Cuando decidí que mi primer matrimonio había terminado y me fui con el
niño. Me sentí abrumado por la culpa mientras separaba a madre y

Mẹ tôi bỏ bố tôi cho người bạn thân nhất của ông ấy, và ông ấy chuyển đến

குடித்துவிட்டு நான் அவர்களின் (உறவினர் & மனைவி) இடத்தை கொஞ்சம் பார்வையிட்டேன்,
ஆனால் எப்போதும் மிகவும் கவனமாக இருந்தது - நம்புவதற்கு வளர்க்கப்பட்டது
பானத்தில் மிதமான (ஆனால் குற்ற அடக்குமுறை போன்றவை அல்ல). நான் கலந்தேன்
புகைப்பழக்கத்துடன் குடிப்பது (நான் அரிதாகவே செய்தேன்) மற்றும் குடித்துவிட்டு இருந்தேன்
லூவில் நோய்வாய்ப்பட மேசையை விட்டு வெளியேற, பின்னர் வீட்டிற்கு சென்றார்
மீண்டும் நோய்வாய்ப்பட்டார்; என் வாழ்க்கையில் ஒருபோதும் மோசமாக உணரவில்லை. மற்றும் நான்
எனது மற்ற பிளாட்மேட்களையோ அல்லது குடும்பத்தினரையோ எதிர்கொள்ளவோ ​​சொல்லவோ விரும்பவில்லை.

đã ly thân một năm trước và khi so sánh anh ấy với hiện tại của tôi
một người mà mọi thứ không mấy thành công.
불가리아는 프랑스와의 축구 경기에서 승리했습니다.
두 쌍둥이 자매가 태어 났을 때 기쁨을 느꼈습니다.

Накануне вечером моя жена родила наших близнецов. я почувствовал
страх во дворе больницы, я боялся, что все будет
Для того, чтобы.

Vài tháng trước, vợ tôi sinh đôi hai chị em. Cô ấy không có
ý tưởng chăm sóc trẻ sơ sinh và cô cảm thấy khá áp bức. Các
thực tế là tôi không thể giúp cô ấy đã gây ra đau buồn cho tôi.

Несколько дней назад я попал в автомобильную аварию. Это было совсем немного, но
по моей вине. Мне было очень стыдно, потому что у меня было настроение
хорошего водителя.

Une peur de la perte d'un ami proche en raison de son
comportement.
Когда мне не удается выполнить обещание.

Tôi cảm thấy vui mừng khi gặp lại con gái sau hai mươi xa cách
ngày.
Tại một điểm yếu của tôi.
நான் மதிக்கும் மக்களின் நம்பிக்கையை நான் நியாயப்படுத்தாதபோது.
Cuando fui admitido en la Universidad.

En raison d'un conflit avec mes parents, il était possible
interrompre mes études.

나는 썩은 시체를 발견했을 때 물건을 찾고 있었다.
쥐.
Before an exam in logics.

Chồng tôi và tôi đã được mời đến nhà của chúng tôi sau đó
chúng tôi đã nhận được lời mời từ phía cha mẹ tôi mà chúng tôi phải
từ chối. Kết quả là họ đã gọi tôi bằng những từ khiêu khích
Sự phẫn nộ.

Mon fils vit à la campagne. Je ressens de la tristesse quand je vois des mères
faire des promenades avec leurs enfants.
Un mensonge de la part d'une personne proche de moi.
Pensé que había tomado una decisión pero vacilé.
मैंने एक करीबी दोस्त खो दिया।

मुझे नंगा कर दिया गया। मैंने एक पुस्तक के संबंध में झूठ बोला था, जिसे मैंने लिया था
पुस्तकालय, क्योंकि मुझे इसे लंबे समय तक रखना था।

I didn't give back in time some money that I had borrowed. My  
friend relied on them.

When I feel I must be with somebody, to talk with somebody - but  
I am alone.

Мы обещали вместе с моим другом отвезти наших друзей в
ресторан и после нескольких часов поисков места без
найти одного, и нам не помогли другие, нам пришлось отказаться
идея.

Cuando tengo que ir a un examen y el examinador es una persona
con un carácter caprichoso y exigencias inestables.

Ero totalmente impreparato per un seminario condotto da un assistente
professore che stimo molto.
When my dog was stolen.

I detest any kind of constraint and hate the attempts of elder  
people to force me to a norm of behavior without having legal or  
moral rights to do it. I felt this emotion when a neighbour of  
mine made me kick out my guests because they had talked very  
loudly and threatened that with "connections" she will expel me  
from the inst.

I experienced long ago when I was sightseeing Bulgarians in a  
foreign language.
Cuando me reuní con amigos que no había visto en mucho tiempo.

मैं एक ट्रेन में एक अजनबी के साथ गुस्सा हो गया जिसने अभद्र व्यवहार किया
और अनैतिक रूप से

I became disgusted with the man on whom I had counted, who I had  
trusted, the man who should have been my mainstay - my father.  
I could hardly make myself (and the others) believe in this  
emotion. It has cumulated after events and deeds. Everything can  
happen in this world.

Para la chica que me ayudó a seguir viviendo y me hizo feliz, cuando
No la veo ni por dos o tres días.

我为微生物学考试感到尴尬。我为之感到as愧
我自己-我所知甚少，考官的水平如何。一世
很少感到羞耻。

Me disgustó un hombre que golpeaba a una mujer en la calle.
Simplemente estaba allí, pero el rudeza me aborrecía.

I had an appointment with a colleague of mine to give her my  
lecture notes. I couldn't go and I didn't send them, and so the  
girl missed a day for the preparation of her term exams.

2年前、私はテレビで映画を見ました。今でもそれは私を作ります
恐れ。

The assistant professor saw me cheat at the preliminary  
examination.

受け入れられたというメッセージが届いてとても嬉しかったです
医学の学生として。

My grandmother has been in a hospital for a week and I still  
haven't had time to see her.

부모님이 해외로 나가고 계시다는 걸 알았을 때
혼자서 몇 년 동안.

Some time ago I was disgusted with the "cleanness" of the  
refectory of our institute.

작년 겨울 학기 시험에서 죄책감을 느꼈습니다. 동료
제 강의 노트를 주라고 요청했습니다.
사전에 시험에 합격했지만 여전히 잘 모르겠습니다.
왜 그에게주지 않았는지. 그 동료는 실패했고 그는
보충 시험에서 통과하지 못할 직전에.

When I was admitted to the Institute. I had problems with many  
people about my applying for this institute and I decided to  
prove that one can pass excellently without visiting any  
preparatory couse. That is - I proved what I could do on my own.

I was at a children's camp abroad. The people (the leaders, my  
coevals) were very king to us. One night we smeared our foreign  
friends with tooth-paste while they were sleeping and then we  
roused the whole camp by our shouts. Later I was so sorry. I  
didn't utter a word for two days, then I went to apologize.

When I was in the fifth class the rating was done in our  
mark-books. I hadn't been examined yet but I had heard from my  
classmates about the scolding they had got at home. My first  
mark was in geography - good 4. I judged I had known for more  
than that and I put down "very good" for fear of being scolded.  
Naturally my parents guessed all about it. They rebuked me for  
what I had done.

祖母の兄が抵抗に活躍した
移動。彼は何度も刑務所に入れられていて、そこで彼は彼を失いました
健康。彼は無効になりました。救急に電話したとき
勤務中の看護師は、彼女が何歳であるかを理解したとき、かなり不愉快な行動をしました
彼は（79）でした。

I suffered from a gynaecological illness. I was quite displeased  
to hear that my roommates had talked about it and they had  
misrepresented the truth. I felt deeply hurt when I learned that  
it was done by a "good" acquaintance of mine.

Je me suis senti heureux quand j'ai pris la chimie organique plutôt difficile
examen.

The sense of guilt came over me too, when I interrupted my  
studies. Why ? Because I felt guilty before my parents ! They  
believed in me though this event did not make them disbelieve me.

I sensed a strong feeling of joy when in the plant, at my working  
place, I got a message that I was admitted as full time student at  
the Higher Agricultural Institute.

Fear when fulfilling my obligations on my first night fatigue  
duty as a soldier.
Утрата больного раком близкого родственника.

Some time ago I promised to meet an acquaintance of mine and to  
carry him some promised papers. I haven't done it until this day.  
Now I feel quite awkward when I meet him.

When you are far away from relatives and friends. I feel sad for  
my early years, for the freedom and the carefree years of  
childhood.

我有几天没去医院见过一个非常亲密的朋友
后来他死了。
When I quarrelled with a very close friend of mine.

Khi tôi không chuẩn bị tốt cho kỳ thi cuối kỳ và giáo viên
đã cố gắng cho tôi điểm ba bằng cách hỏi tôi một số câu hỏi rất dễ. Tôi
bỏng với sự xấu hổ sau đó.

No fue hace mucho tiempo cuando dos de mis amigos y yo nos emborrachamos bastante
y uno de ellos empezó a delirar bajo la influencia del alcohol.
Sentí miedo por lo que podría haber pasado.

Immediately after the New Year holidays I happened to visit a  
party where there was a lot of alcohol and I became drunk. On the  
next day I felt sort of ashamed when I remembered what I had said  
and done on the night before.
내가 고등 연구소에 입학했을 때.

I feel fear quite often but this feeling was very strong last  
year when my husband was quite unexpectedly sent to the hospital.

I felt sad when a friend of mine died and I felt that something  
had irrevocably gone away from me.

I felt disgust with a lady teacher who used to nag, to mock, to  
interrupt everyone of my fellow students each time we had a class  
with her in our first year.

Das fühlte ich, als ich meine erste Lüge erzählte und dann war
gefangen.

Estuve por primera vez en una brigada este año. En ese momento mi
hermana iba a tener un hijo. Estaba loco de alegría cuando abrí el
telegrama de mis padres y supe que tenía un sobrino.

Это было несколько лет назад, когда однажды вечером люди пришли домой и
сказал нам, что мой отец был тяжело ранен в аварии.

나는 내가 입학 허가를받지 못했다는 것을 깨달았을 때 이런 느낌에 직면했습니다.
높은 점수에도 불구하고 첫 번째 분류에서 I
입학 시험에 응시했습니다.

I took part in a football match. The referee was extremely  
partial to the opposite team. This stirred up my discontent and  
anger.

在一家酒吧的暑假期间，我碰巧看到一个死人
世界女人。

Lần đầu tiên và cũng là lần cuối cùng tôi cố gắng đưa nôi và
giáo viên đã quay lưng lại với tôi nhưng ngay khi tôi đang
tài liệu ra cô ấy quay lại và nhìn thấy tôi.

Disgust for a person who treated me badly, and has treated other  
people similarly - including lying, hiding facts, being  
deceitful, unfair, etc.

Losing my temper and allowing myself to act childishly by yelling  
and screaming at a person who I felt had done me wrong - in  
effect lowering myself to their level.

When I had lied to a friend/son about some things we had  
discussed and I had to be one better.

На уроке социологии я очень злился на некоторых членов общества.
общество по эксплуатации полинезийского народа, набеги на рассвете
Полиция (Мартин Лютер Кинг, Черные в С.А.). Но это было просто
отражение собственных недостатков.

When I meet old past pupils of mine - and find they are all doing  
well - I feel joy. Yesterday I met a young woman (20 yrs) I'd  
taught her at 6 yrs, then at 12 yrs and hadn't seen her for last  
3-4 yrs; she was no longer a waitress but a meter maid for  
Council.

My dog of 16 and 1/2 years - "Lord Grey" died in his sleep - His  
death caused me more and deeper sadness than I thought.

I told Mr Winter of Downtown Fashion to go to - when he did not  
accept my Visa !
過去の男性の友達からの昼食招待を受け入れた時。

When my husband got picked up in our new car for drunken driving.  
We had made a pact the other would not drink and so therefore  
would be the driver for the evening etc. I was not present at the  
time.

என்னுடன் கலந்துரையாடாமல் எனது பங்குதாரர் நிலைமை அதை முடிவு செய்தார்
எங்களுக்கு ஒரு இடைவெளி இருக்க வேண்டிய நேரம் மற்றும் முன்னோக்கி சென்று அவரை ஏற்பாடு செய்தார்
அடுத்த 6-12 மாதங்களுக்கு சொந்த வாழ்க்கை, அதற்கு முந்தைய நாள் என்னிடம் கூறினார்
சகிப்புத்தன்மையுடனும் நட்புடனும் நடப்பதாக இருந்தது
முந்தைய வாரம்.

நான் ஒரு வெளிநாட்டு நகரத்தில் வசித்து வந்தேன்
நான் ஒரு முழு சந்திப்புக்கு 12 மாதங்களுக்கு முன்பு நகரத்தை விட்டு வெளியே வாருங்கள்
புதிய நண்பர்கள் குழு, அவர்களை விமான நிலையத்தில் விட்டுச் சென்றது வருத்தமாக இருந்தது
அவர்கள் பல வழிகளில் எனக்கு உதவி செய்ததால் எனக்கு அதிர்ச்சியாக இருந்தது
அவர்களில் பலரை மீண்டும் பார்க்க மாட்டேன்.

После того, как мне удалось провалить первый год в университете, я был
боялся, что буду делать со своим будущим. Я не хотел
рутинная работа с 9 до 5, и все же я не знал, смогу ли я заплатить по-своему
через год без субсидий в университете, чтобы остепениться и
продолжаю учебу.

Comme de la culpabilité - le plus honteux que j'aie jamais ressenti, c'est quand j'ai commencé
se sentir coupable d'avoir eu des relations sexuelles avec mon copain quand c'était
seulement «la chose à faire», et pas vraiment un acte d'amour.

My mother along with some of my friends gave me a surprise  
birthday party - they invited a large number of my friends along  
too.

मेरी माँ देर रात तक घर नहीं आई (युगों पहले)। वैसे भी
अगर मुझे नहीं पता कि मेरे माता-पिता कहां हैं और वे कब वापस आएंगे
यह सोचना शुरू करें कि शायद उनके साथ कोई दुर्घटना हुई है और हो रही है
शायद मर गया।

Because I am the Captain of a basketball team I usually organise  
a roster system so that everyone in the team can have a turn at  
doing either a duty or a ref. A lot of the time the girls can't  
be bothered or just forget - I usually have to fill in.

When I was in a car with my parents and friends and we had to  
back up (reverse) pass a river which when I recall it (I was only  
about 5 yrs) seemed we were going to fall in and drown.

My brother gave me a beating because he could not beat me  
verbally.

Joy for me is when all my family gather around home for special  
occasions as Christmas etc. It really gives me joy to see my  
family and relatives and to observe natures productivity process  
which have been going on for centuries.
Never really had the experience just yet - N/A.
Had fear of losing husband.

That if ever I was really naughty I would be sent away from my  
Mum and Dad to another family. I was fostered from age 5 and  
didn't get to Mum and Dad until I was 6 and then legally adopted  
at 14.

A child told me she had been sexually abused by her step-father.  
I only knew the child and had not come into contact with either  
parent. I tried to do what was best for the child. The event and  
the stepfather disgusted me.

I lied to my mother in the sixth form she said she would ring to  
find out and I had to tell her I had lied.
Joy at meeting a woman I love very much.
When I masturbated in my room.

When I betrayed my lover, she told me something in confidence, I  
felt at the time I had to relay the information back to the  
person concerned, as I felt the situation volitile, did this  
without telling my lover, she felt like piggy in the middle, as  
she was not directly concerned. Maybe you could call it gossip I  
felt different after I had slept on it. If I had waited, thought,  
NOW I would not have done it.

Sitting in a bus, I heard behind, the voice of a girl I was  
friendly with. After her talking for some time with another girl  
I decided it wasn't her in fact that someone miming her, which it  
was when I finally looked. I was talking to a friend at the time.

I felt that I contributed to a possible rift in the relationship  
between a boy and girl soon to be married, in my flat after I  
moved in. After stating my celibacy to him which she overheard  
and didn't previously know about I suspect.

성폭행 (강간이 아니라 열정적 인 키스)
친구의 아버지-그는 나를 집으로 데려다 줄 때 멈췄습니다. 나는
승강기를 원하지 않았고, 3 번 거절했고,
다시 거절하는 것은 무례합니다. 그가 무엇을할지 정말 두려워했습니다.

When during a social evening with my father, brother, sister,  
close friend and my father's 2nd wife - I had an argument with my  
father, who abused my friend who was sticking up for me.

नशे में रहते हुए मैंने किसी के (लड़की के) निजी स्थान पर आक्रमण किया
काफी हद तक।

Girlfriend arriving back from overseas and picking her up from  
airport. When she finally appeared from customs and we came in  
contact again.
The death of an animal we had reared.

发现我的女朋友是一个妓女，并且曾经
在我们的关系中看到许多其他人。

Non aver ritenuto responsabile un incidente in cui
l'auto familiare ha subito lievi danni.

Had started a relationship and did nothing to keep it up, partly  
the use of another person.

My cat was sick and I had to take him to the vet to be put down -  
no one else there to do it.

Faire une passe sexuelle à ma cousine avec qui j'ai un très proche
relation personnelle.

Ожидание такси - когда в течение 1/2 часа два отдельных человека
вызвали меня драться без видимой причины, кроме
пьяный.

Deliberately provoked by someone close. Angered by the  
deliberation not the provocation.

Моя девушка сильно подвела меня 3 раза за неделю. Эти
экземпляры суммировали все негативные стороны наших отношений
который в то время казался обреченным на провал.

When a close friend failed to live up to the expectations I had  
of him - thereby causing pain to his spouse. I believe that my  
anger was probably a reaction of fear that I wouldn't be able to  
live up to my own expectations.

Listening and watching a tape of someone with AIDS being  
prejudiced against at a counselling course on AIDS with 20  
others.
Нападал пьяный сосед.

At school teacher for not allowing us to go out on New Year's Eve  
when on a class trip overseas.

12 살 때 아이들을 돌 보았지만
매우 책임감있게 행동했고 그들 중 한 명이 부상을 입었습니다.
பல ஆண்டுகளாக அவமானத்தை உணரவில்லை.

I borrowed a friend's books and forgot I had them, she asked for  
them back and I told her I didn't have them. I duly found and  
returned them.

A serious drug error while nursing that I knew I was responsible  
for (patient lived, no complications fortunately).

When I was finally able to return to a job that I enjoyed doing  
after several months absence (I was not needed during this time).

Someone who was speeding was forced to slow down when I pulled  
out onto the road and proceeded to abuse me at the next set of  
traffic lights.

When someone whom I considered my friend, without telling me he  
was annoyed, proceeded to ignore me for several meets with no  
apparent reason.

When I made a mistake at work and when questioned about it  
pretended I had nothing to do with the problem.

At my wedding - standing with the man I love and acknowledging  
that fact to members of family and friends.

As a result of breaking the indicator light as mentioned  
for guilt.

At the death of my husband's father's mother which occurred  
during university examinations and therefore I was unable to  
attend her funeral.

Being driven by friend who suddenly swerved and skidded a little.  
It was night and on a long trip. We ended up on side of road.

Prolonged "niggling" of friend on a single theme which I  
considered of no consequence.

In a flat in Sydney - rough area at home on my own - the flat had  
been burgled the night before and no way of locking the door.
Stealing money from my parents when I was young.

When I went to the pub with a large group of friends, we drank  
and danced.

My boyfriend promised to take me to see a game of tennis and rang  
saying he was going to the pub with some of his friends instead.

My mother was unwell and went for many cancer tests. She spent  
time in hospital being opened and closed many times.

I was driving along and saw this young guy urinating into the  
gutter, in broad daylight.
Birth of children.
Obscene phone calls.

Close friend leave to go overseas for an indefinite period.  
Farewell scene at airport.
When caught shop-lifting as for shame.

Receiving understanding from within self of a subject I had  
previously wished to understand better.

To talk in a meeting - expound my thoughts on a subject. Fear  
delayed me acting to do this.
Watching suffering in Third World country.

Having unwanted attention paid to me in my place of work -  
harrassment (and sexual harrassment) by another worker -  
disgusted by his implications.

Close friend discovered I had deceived them. Felt shame at having  
done it and knowing that they knew.

At a party my best girlfriend got really drunk and went off with  
a guy she knows I really like.

Someone asked me to do something and I made up an excuse and said  
no. I then went and didn't the same thing with someone else and  
hoped the first person never found out.

In arguments with a close friend or relative where my point of  
view is completely disregarded.

I once saw a programme on TV describing how certain wild life  
films were made and was disgusted by the treatment of certain  
animals in this particular programme of the polar bear.

When my former boyfriend and I reconciled and he decided that I  
was very important to him. I had always wanted us to get back  
together again, but had doubted the likelihood of this, so I was  
very happy when my small amount of faith was vindicated.

I did a solo flight from Ardmore to Kaikohe before I got my pilot  
licence. I can remember it was gorgeous day and I was on a  
natural high, cruising up the coast with my maps and compasses  
and gear. Other pilots had seen me off and wished me good luck  
and it was a real adventure.

I "cooked" the engine in my father's car - it was actually his  
fault because he hadn't fixed the temperature gauge or told me.  
When I finally got home I was absolutely screamed at and the  
anger I experienced was over the injustice of it all plus the  
huge row which developed.

This sounds really predictable and usual but it was absolutely  
heart-rending at the time. My first lover (I was 15) just rang up  
one day and announced that he had found another woman. I never  
saw him again and it hurt because I was positive that it was  
"TRUE LOVE" !!

When I was very young and we moved as a family to Auckland from  
Wellington, this meant new school and friends (etc.).

When someone ignores what I am saying or doesn't let me have my  
point of view and they monopolise a conversation.

When I got into an argument with someone and was very abusive,  
but they were a close friend and I later regretted it.

When I had come home drunk the day after a party, I felt very  
ashamed in front of my parents.

When I crashed by bike into an old lady crossing a road and  
knocked her down.
As in sadness (A), relating to this slaghter of fur-seals.

My father recently having a heart attack - spending a few months  
in hospital.

My flatmate and close friend living and sleeping with another  
close friend of mine.

Stealing money from a milk token jar from a close friend of the  
family when visiting.
Talking with someone I admire a lot.
Caused a family disturbance.
When I considered writing a load of crap for this emotion.
Beating my brother up.

Social situation - at the pub - a close friend of 2 years told  
the group around us of advances I had made.

My father died 4 years ago, 18 months after my mother died. I  
feld my sister was responsible for his death, in that she "hadn't  
loved him". I felt ashamed for myself, and for my family.
Hearing my girlfriend accept my offer of marriage.

Brother continually interupting while I was talking on the  
telephone.

Flicking through a magazine showing pictures of homosexual men  
committing various acts.
When I found out I had passed all of my university exams.

I deliberately avoided a person who I wanted to hurt, and who  
wanted to talk to me.

I passed on some gossip that was untrue and cause two friends to  
have a fight who were already experiencing difficulties with each  
other.

When I received my U.E. accredited as I was totally unexpecting  
it and I was so happy.

One of my very good friends came to me for advice as her  
boyfriend had been hitting her and beating her quite harmfully.

When I let my girlfriend use my essay to help her to write hers  
and the tutor found them alike.

When I had to lie to my boyfriend so that he wouldn't suspect I'd  
bought him a xmas present as expensive as I had.
I received an assignment back, and got an A+ grading.

At the beginning of the year I moved to a new city - I felt sad  
as I had to leave many friends and family members behind.

I read a newspaper article about dogs being stolen in order to  
use them for fighting purposes.

Getting University Entrance accredited and arriving home from  
boarding school on accrediting leave.

Thinking that I had been seen smoking at school by a teacher -  
waiting to be summoned to the headmaster's office.

At my grandfather's funeral - My grandparents virtually raised me  
as my mother was a solo-parent and had to work.

I let my pet budgie loose to fly around my room one afternoon. A  
few hours afterwards I found he was still free, went in and out  
of my room leaving the door open. My cat got in and killed my  
budgie - this happened to 3 budgies.
The birth of my first child.

Most recently when the chairman at the New Zeeland Rugby Union  
announced that the All Blacks' would accept the invitation of  
South Africa to play rugby in that country.

When I first saw the state of a cafeteria in the grounds of the  
university. Due to students own lack of concern for the  
environment in which they eat and drink. Rubbish and spilled tea  
and coffee left everywhere.

When my husband discovered I was having an affair with another  
man.

When my grandmother died. She stayed with us until I had the age  
of 10. When she died I was 13 and I remember the moment after the  
funeral: I sat on the table and cried.

Ein Mann nahm Platz, indem er nach einer Weile seinen Mantel anzog
Der Stuhl war noch leer. Ich fragte ihn, ob ich den Stuhl benutzen könne.
Er stimmte nicht zu, dass der Stuhl für seinen Mantel war.
When the relationship with my girlfriend broke up.

A friend came to tell me that her father invited me to go on  
holiday with them in Benidorm otherwise I could not afford to go  
on holiday.

Im Alter von 12 Jahren musste ich mich immer um meine Kleinen kümmern
Bruder und Schwester Ich konnte damals nie schlafen. Ich habe es mir immer vorgestellt
gruselige Männer schleichen sich in unser Haus.

The landlord had selected a new lodger on her own, while we used  
to do that it was not what she had done, but how she did it that  
made me angry.

I saw a terrible accident happen and I laughed a lot of the  
fright and because I was nervous.

At the moment when I heard the result of an examination and it  
proved that I succeeded the second year of my study.

I can't give one description here. I often feel joyful when I  
have done things good in relation to other people especially when  
my friend says he loves me and I also tell him that I love him.
I was very sad when my first boyfriend finished our relationship.

I was once raped (one year ago) by a man who was a lot older than

more than I wanted to give him since there were other people in

I felt shame when I didn't study enough for my exams and as a  
result I failed. I then invented idle stories to talk it good for

Tonight in bed when I realised how bad my relationship with my  
friend was.

That I didn't want my friend to leave on holiday for 10 days  
because I thought I would miss him. I was constantly trying to

I had to unscrew something on my car. I didn't succeed after two

Khi tôi còn nhỏ, một ngày nọ, tôi về nhà vào đêm khuya và tôi
đã không nhận thấy một lỗ hổng người đàn ông không được che đậy và rơi vào đó. Tôi đã ở đó vì
vài phút.

One day I was in the countryside with several friends, and we

I ran over my dog with a bicycle when I was carrying him tied to

当我在越野比赛中获得一等奖时。

I found myself involved in a fight in which a person died and I

I saw the gare of a prison.  This gare and the building were in

A mishap suffered on misinterpreting a girl's proposition.
Before I had a tooth pulled out.  I was very upset and ill.

Khi tôi làm xong một dạng đề thi và không dám trả lời
bất kỳ câu hỏi nào, tôi nghi ngờ không biết mình có vượt qua kỳ thi hay không.

When I heard about the treatment of a friend in jail. Really  
inhuman. I never realised that such things also happen in the

I cannot remember a situation in which I felt ashamed. I was  
eating with some people and a little boy I took care of. I warned  
him often not to knock down his glass of mild. When I took  
out his chair I knocked down my own glass.

My mother always took my side. That brought about quarrels with  
my father. I knew she didn't like that and I felt very sorry for

En vacances en Grèce, j'ai appelé ma meilleure amie, elle m'a dit

It appeared that I gave correct answers to all questions during

Als meine Großmutter starb, war ihr Leben schwer und ihre letzten Stunden

இறுதி முடிவுகள் குறித்து அதிகாரப்பூர்வமற்ற முறையில் எனக்கு அறிவிக்கப்பட்டது
மேல்நிலைப் பள்ளியின் தேர்வு. ஒரு ஆசிரியர் அவற்றை எழுதினார்

私は死、その永遠、未知、
ここにいるという感覚。多くの場合、暗く静かな場所でベッドに横たわっていますが、

When the relationship with my first girlfriend broke up and I

항상 스포츠 홀의 열쇠를 아끼던 사람이 머물렀다

I am a teacher in arts and crafts (boys from 15-16 years). for

I lived together with my boyfriend. One night he stayed away and

I talk too much, cannot keep things secret. I promised a friend

I wrote a letter to my father to ventilate my bottled up

When I was 10 years old I stained our bench with a fountain-pen,

I went to the ballet lessons with a little friend in the dark. On

After a quarrel with my mother in which matters were "inflated"

Mon vélo a été démoli.

I saved up money for a good purpose. As I also have to organise a

Als ich zum ersten Mal zur UNZA kam, kannte ich die Art von Menschen nicht, die ich hatte

mich.

I had gone home for a week-end and when I came back I found that  
my clothes and my bedding had been stolen.
When my father passed away.
When I failed the grade seven exams.

One day my mother went to visit her friends.  When she came back  
she scolded me for not having kept the house in order, so I  
decided not to talk to her.

When I found out that my sister had been playing with my  
confidential things which she had taken from my hand-bag.
When I got very low marks in one of the assignments.
When a thunder belt hit the roof top of the building I was in.

When my friends died one after the other.  The first died in a  
car accident and the second one recently, due to an illness.

Getting drunk and creating a lot of trouble at a place I respect  
- my friend's home.

The day I encountered a queer mamba face to face in a chunk of  
leaves behind our house.

I was caught doing something I was not supposed to do.  I did  
something with the person who caught me (bribe) and even though  
he promised not to report me, I am still frightened.

I was caught doing something bad and I bribed the person who  
caught me.  Later I felt very bad, maybe I should have paid for  
my bad behaviour.

I was a passenger in a vehicle when suddenly another vehicle came  
from behind to overtake us.  However another one was coming right  
in front so the other vehicle changed course and blocked our way  
and so we crashed against the side of the road.

I was asked to stop studying economics, a field which interested  
me, by my employers.
मेरे प्यार के प्रस्ताव को एक ऐसी महिला ने ठुकरा दिया जिसे मैं वास्तव में प्यार करती थी।
When I first came to the campus.
When I lost my father in a car accident.

I felt ashamed when a friend, I had always respected, insulted me  
in public.  He was drunk.

Als ich mit meinen Freunden eine Erkundungstour machte und mich fast darin verlaufen hätte
eine ungewohnte Umgebung. Es wurde dunkel und wir nicht
weiß, wie man nach Hause kommt.

When my father did not get back from Chipata on time, he was thus  
holding back progress as everything depended on him.  I felt  
angry over his actions.

When thieves broke into our neighbour's house and later we heard  
gunshots.
When my friend had a child out of wedlock.

I went home late one evening and saw that the security lights  
were off.  I got inside the gate and just then I realized that  
the dogs may be outside.

My little niece, who is very talkative, suddenly became very  
naughty and began wetting her pants.  She did it one afternoon.

My cousin and I were at the farm and at night we drunk like fools  
and made a lot of noise.  We had drunk two much of wine.

The fridge we had at home had a lock.  One day when I wanted  
something, I unscrewed the door but unfortunately I was caught in  
the act.
When I was selected for the university.

When I saw an accident, a woman was run over and she died on the  
spot.

While watching a movie, someone who was drunk started vomiting  
helplessly.

When I ate my sister's food and then she found out that it was  
me.  I felt very ashamed but still refused to admit that it was  
me.
When I was told that the form five results were out.

When I saw my younger sister being bothered by a boy she did not  
know.
When I beat up a stupid boy who was fond of cracking jokes on me.
When I was selected for higher education, i.e grade 7 to formI.

When I impregnated a certain girl, I thought that I would be  
forced to marry her or go to court.

When I sided with my mother in a quarrel she had with my father  
before they briefly separated.

Two guys were fighting murderously and I feared that one of them  
would be killed.
When I could not reason my friend, it angered me.

I feel disgusted at not having got aa "A" in yesterday's  
practicals of G220.
I felt very ashamed at having got a book by force from a girl.

Our only elder sister got married and started having pains in her  
abdomen and she was told that she could not have children. To our  
suprise she had a baby 2 months back.

My uncle was taken to the UTC for an operation as he had cancer.   
There had been a lot of deaths of late - 3 out of every 4  
operated.  I was scared for my uncle's life.

I had planned to go to town with my friend at 1500 hours but she  
went for the registration and I waited for a good 1 and a 1/2 hours.  It  
was vital for me to go to town but I could not as it was she who  
had the money.  Finally I borrowed some money from friends and we  
went to town.  I was really angry with my friend.

I dreamt of my father's death while I was at secondary school.  I  
was screaming at the top of my voice and was woken up by my  
friend.  That day I was really sad.

We were at a party, this guy I liked and me.  I really loved him  
and gathered enough courage to ask him to kiss me.  He did not do  
it but instead asked me what I would like for my birthday.  I  
told him that I would like a kiss more than anything else but he  
excused himself and said that it was impossible.  I really felt  
embarassed.

We were at secondary school and I was making a lot of noise.  The  
teacher came to ask us as to who was making all the noise.  I did  
not own up so the  whole class was punished.
When I met an elephant in the bush.
When I was walking around all alone at night.
When my dad passed away.
When one of my lovers told me that I was a flirt.
When I was locked out of my room by my room-mate's friend.
When I found out that someone close to me was flirting around.

When my neighbour's house was broken into and shots could be  
heard.
When a thief broke into my house and stole some valuable goods.

I felt very angry when a mishanga seller robbed me of the  
transport money I had to go to school.

I felt guilty when I said bad things to my sister, I had not

When my wife told me that the refrigerator had stopped working.

I was overwhelmed with joy when I received the acceptance letter  
to UNZA.  This happened again when I passed all my first year

In 1982, I was annoyed at an uncle who was drunk and was beating  
up his old father.  He claimed that the father was responsible

When I told a girl that I could not take her out that night as I

When my wife gave birth to a baby boy - my only son to date.

When burglars with guns forced themselves into my house and  
ordered me to give them money or face death.
When my colleague spat on my face after a quarrel.
When my elder brother died.
When my friend, after a beer spree vomitted in my sitting room.
When I was caught going out with another girl by my girlfriend.

One of my colleagues accused me of having stolen his iron and I  
was sure that I had done no such thing.
The passing away of my mum.

About a dozen girls laughed at me and I was sure that there was  
nothing wrong with me.
When my mum learnt that I had beaten up someone in a fight.
When I met my mother after not having seen her for three years.

My father resigned from work, and soon after this his elder brother  
died.  The next day my granny died (my mother's mother).  My dad  
remains the only living member of his family.

For my parents anniversary, we hosted a party and we were very

Some people were sitting outside and saying things which were not  
really true.

I came across a woman in town who was very drunk.  She was  
swearing at everyone and carried on drinking even though she  
could hardly stand.

I had stopped talking to a very close friend of mine.  A week  
later he came over to try and make friends with me  again and  
from the way he talked I felt that he was a very mean preson.
When my younger sister, who was then 16 years old, was pregnant.
When I attended my cousin's 31st birthday.

I got a very nasty electrical shock when I was tampering with  
some electrical applainces.
When I was subjected to a very nasty joke by a group of friends.

I took a girl out once and discovered that she was going around  
with one of my close friends.

When I discovered that my girlfriend was going around with  
another boy.
When I failed the grade 7.

When I had lied, saying that I never take bread from the dinning  
hall and a friend of mine caught me doing it.  He thus proved to  
me that I did in fact take the bread.

The day I was nearly stabbed to death by ruffians who wanted to  
take my money.  I refused to give them any money and they started

myself.

When a kid dropped my father's radio cassette player, which he  
had just repaired.

When I told a lie to a friend of my sister on April fool's day.   
She later came to see me and told me that it was a very foolish

A girl dropped some stuff from her bag and when I tried to help  
her I realized that she had used me and I was made to look like a

When I was beaten up by thieves on behalf of some friends of mine  
as they thought that I had a lot of money and would not part

When I received the acceptance letter from UNZA.  I had just  
come home from work when my kind sister handed me an enveloppe  
which I opened and was overcome with joy.

I was at home and we were sleeping when we heard some robbers  
breaking into our house.
I took an exam which I failed terribly as I had not studied.

When I found out that the seat in the coach that I had booked had  
been sold to somebody else.
When money was stolen from my pocket.
My son passed grade 7 and was accepted for form I.

I bought something and the shopkeeper gave me more change, I  
realized this after I had left the shop and was on the bus-stop -  
and I then needed the money.

When I received the acceptance form for the second year at

I was disgusted at the way the bus conductor threw out an old

This last August when my parents dropped me off and moved me into

When I found my boyfriend, who I had been dating for a year, at

The same as for SHAME and DISGUST. I was asked to resign my

I saw in a movie a block on which affluence and poverty existed.

I received a grade above average on a midterm (chemistry) and I

I saw someone that I thought I knew repeatedly drunk. I do not

Every time I was around this one person I would stick my foot in

Right before I went to a concert with my last boyfriend he told  
me that although he told me he was going to take me to the

I felt extreme joy the day I was baptized. I was one with God.

I felt fear when my friend and I broke into an abandoned military

When I committed a sin mentioned in ANGER. A sin of sexual

When I just took a shower with a girl down the hall. I felt that

When I took the B.A exams,I was expecting a 1st class even though

When I passed the B.A exams and my parents allowed me to carry on

During a class I was asked a question which I did not hear very

Once I was caught by thugs aged between 20-35, they asked me to

 She left and I had to do without supper.

separated.

I had been telling lies and people discovered instantly that I  
was telling lies. I felt very shameful and I felt like  
disappearing from people.

I had spent the weekend visiting relatives and friends and didn't  
study for Anatomy class on Monday.

I had an interview for entry into college. The results were to be  
announced on radio. After a long period of waiting the results  
were released. I had succeded - tension was relieved by joy.

When I stepped on a snake at home, it was dark but there was  
moonlight.

When I heard that my Uncle had passed away in a road traffic  
accident.

I went to a party with my boyfriend who got so drunk and started  
vomiting. It was so disgusting.

I was given a gift by my sister. There were many pleasant things  
in this parcel.

I wrote an Exam and happened to have not done as well as I  
thought I would. I was angry to myself for not having done so  
well.

I received a letter which was too strong for me. It said I had  
done something which I really didn't do.
A friend of mine was shouting at me in a group of juniors.

When I was travelling home by bus and suddenly the bus hit and  
the bus leaned against a wall.

I felt ashamed one day when my teacher shouted at me in the  
presence of my boyfriend.

I was afraid when my boyfriend came home because my parents  
disapproved him of his coming home. I thought they would chase me  
out of the house.
When my cousin passed away.

When I was a child I broke plates because I wasn't given food on  
the grounds of coming home late.
I felt guilty after stealing a cookery book from my colleagues.

I was filled with joy when I heard that I had been selected to  
come here at Kamuzu College of Nursing.
I was angry when somebody stole my half petticoat.
I felt sad when my father was sick.
I saw a septic, smelling wound.

One day I was walking with my boyfriend. We met my ex-boyfriend  
and out of jealousy he started calling me names.

I was at a boarding school during my primary school days. I was  
broken so I pretended I was very sick. My father came and he  
picked me up. He spent a lot of money on medical expenses which  
all proved to be negative.

I felt so afraid when dad fell ill, he had never suffered from  
that disease since and I had never seen him as he was.

I failed my Nutrition paper which was the paper ending the  
course.

When a patient in the ward died (one who had been under my care).  
I felt as if I didn't give the appropriate care to the patient.

One day my friend told me that she had heard that I was moving  
about with her boyfriend. I was disgusted with the news.

I was walking one day and I met a man who wanted to ask me about  
my brother but I didn't stop to hear what he was saying. I was  
ashamed when I found him at home and he told my brother what had  
happened.

I insulted my friend for a small reason and after time I realised  
that I was wrong and felt ashamed; everytime I meet her I feel  
ashamed.

My patient died of Anaemia while I was organising blood  
transfusion for him, so I felt guilty, because I thought that may  
be I was slow.
When I was selected to start Form I at Malosa Secondary school.
When I hit my young sister without a valid reason.

I was in the house at night and I heard a hyena crying outside.  
It cried for almost an hour and I feared it might break the  
window and enter inside the house.
I was very sad when I heard that my Auntie had passed away.

I was disgusted the other day I was told to take off the dog's  
faeces around the house since they smelled bad I did the job but  
in the end I felt disgusted.

I was very ashamed when I failed a test in Standard 7. The  
teacher told the other students to shout and laugh at me.

When I heard that I had passed my MCE Exam, I spent the whole  
day dancing and eating sugarcanes from our garden.

When I wet my head (or bed ?) one day my sister discovered it and reported  
it to the other siblings. So my mother had to scold me.

It was in 1983 September when MCE results were being announced on  
the radio. When I heard my name that I had done well I just kept  
quiet. I was so happy that I couldn't even talk.

I met a certain lady at the bus depot who was using a bad  
language but was a very smart looking lady.

One day I shouted at my brother who didn't do any wrong to me  
only that I had a disappointment from a friend and projected it  
on to him. He cried and I felt guilty after sometime.

I was really shameful when my mother beat me in the presence of  
my friends because I didn't cook lunch up until 2 o'clock.

I was angry when I had not been granted a leave out pass during  
the last weekend.
I was ashamed to tell my mother that I fell down with a bicycle.

I felt guilty when I had refused to lend money to my friend who  
needed it immediately.
My boyfriend didn't turn up after promising that he was coming.

I was forced to go to a party with someone I didn't love and he  
was telling people that I was his girlfriend.

After passing my Malawi Certificate of Education Exam and being  
selected to Kamuzu College of Nursing.

I was sleeping alone in the house at night. A boy putting on a  
short only knocked at the window whispering that I should open  
for him.
When my grandmother passed away.

I was to prepare relish for the family. I overcooked it and no  
one liked the meal that day.

The time when my sister had her first baby I was so happy and  
joyous because she stayed for two days after marriage before she  
had a child.
I was so angry with a patient who refused to take drugs.

When I saw a lady putting on a pair of trousers, I felt it was a  
disguise according to Malawi culture.

I used to have two boyfriends in the past. Then one of them  
wanted to get engaged to me. I agreed but was guilt-conscious for  
disappointing the other one.

I felt disgust when I saw a drunkard vomiting very offensive  
matter.

I had fear of my father (parents) when I first became pregnant. I  
was afraid of delivery itself and whether I would give birth to a  
stiiborn or a baby.

It was when I discovered that my boyfriend had another girl. I  
discovered it through a letter he wrote to the girl when he was  
away. When I asked him he accepted it.

My father promised to send me pocket money at the month-end since  
I wanted to buy a new pair of shoes when I was at secondary  
school, but he didn't.
Accepted by the college football team.
Made mistakes in exam.
Article published in the college newspaper.
My grandmother died.
Did not read reference when other people read them.
Before examination.
Listening to long speech of the party leaders wasting my time.
Helping in the nursery school.

Waiting for a bus not coming for a long time, and the bus drivers  
were having a long lunch.
Not having good marks like other people for homeworks.
Saw the village I come from still pay money to buy wife.
Found out that I am not good at football.
Gave the wrong meal tickets to other people (my classmate).

Too many people in TV room, I was not able to get a seat to watch  
TV.
My sister marrying a bad man. He is cruel to her.

I was not able to help my sister to understand that her husband  
is a bad man before she was married to him.

The serving lady in the students' dining hall shouting at  
studennts.
Left alone in the dining hall at night.
Class leader getting me to do things he did not want to do.
DVD General Y evil J Ian прибывает.
路上で久しぶりに会った友達。
Going to the examn not well prepared.
Escucho a la gente hablar de mí y decir que soy estúpido.

எனது வகுப்பு கால்பந்து அணியைப் பார்க்க சீக்கிரம் எழுந்திருக்கவில்லை

சீனா பின்தங்கிய நிலையில் உள்ளது என்பதை இந்த சொற்பொழிவிலிருந்து கண்டுபிடிப்பது

ஏ மற்றும் நான் சுங் சிக்கு புதிய ஆசியா படிக்கட்டில் நடந்து கொண்டிருந்தோம்
எங்கள் விரிவுரைக்கான கல்லூரி மற்றும் நான் அவளுடன் அவனைப் பார்த்தேன். அவர் ஒரு கை வைத்தார்
அவள் தோள்பட்டை சுற்றி பிரகாசமாகவும் மகிழ்ச்சியாகவும் சிரிக்கவும். நான் செய்யவில்லை
தைரியம் மற்றும் பார்க்க விரும்பவில்லை, விரைவாக அவர்களால் நடந்து சென்றார். தி
ஒரு பேசும் ஆர்வம் மறைந்துவிட்டது, நான் இருக்க விரும்பினேன்
அமைதியாக. ஆனால் நான் A ஐ அறிய விரும்பவில்லை, அதனால் நான் அவரை விட்டுவிட்டு சென்றேன்
F. க்கு இது நடக்கும் என்று நான் எதிர்பார்த்திருக்க வேண்டும்.

நன்றாக வேலை செய்யாத ஒரு விளக்குடன் கொண்டு வரப்பட்டது. கதவு
விசித்திரமான ஒலிகளை உருவாக்கியது மற்றும் விசித்திரமான விஷயங்கள் என்று நான் உறுதியாக நம்புகிறேன்
நடக்கிறது. மிகவும் திகிலூட்டும் பிட் பல இருந்தன
குடிசையில் அலமாரி மற்றும் நான் கண்ணாடியில் பார்த்த ஒவ்வொரு முறையும்
அலமாரி எனக்கு பின்னால் "பொருள்கள்" இருப்பதாக உணர்ந்தேன். தி
இரவு முழுவதும் பயத்திலும் அமைதியற்ற நிலையிலும் கழிந்தது.

जब मैं पी 3 में था तो मुझे हमेशा सजा दी जाती थी क्योंकि मैं अपना काम करना भूल जाऊंगा

Я одолжил записную книжку одноклассника за неделю до
осмотр и я пообещал вернуть ее через два дня
время. Я был тогда очень занят и многое забыл; как и я
не очень часто бывала дома, она не могла со мной связаться. Когда я
начал свою ревизию я понял, что ее блокнот был у меня
стол на пять дней. Я немедленно связался с ней и вернул
ей. Хотя она ничего не сказала, я чувствовал себя очень виноватым.

Als ich in einen Bus stieg, stellte ich fest, dass meine Brieftasche gestohlen worden war.
Aus monetärer Sicht war es kein großer Verlust, aber ich
verlor einige Dokumente - Ausweispapiere. Infolgedessen musste ich
Verbringen Sie mehrere Tage, um einen neuen zu bekommen. Ich werde immer
Erinnern Sie sich an all die Arbeit, die ich zu tun hatte, und an die schlechte Behandlung, die ich hatte
litt unter dem bürokratischen Verhalten der Zivilbevölkerung
Diener. Ich hatte schon Pech gehabt und sie behandelten mich wie einen
kriminell. Zu einem bestimmten Zeitpunkt wollte ich mich wirklich streiten
Sie.

Sau khi tham dự một cuộc thi bài hát do một ban nhạc tên là "Chyne" đề xuất
chúng tôi (6 người chúng tôi) đã đợi các thành viên của ban nhạc chào đón chúng tôi trong
trước sân khấu. Chúng tôi đã đi ra ngoài sau một vài phút như ban đầu
thời gian đóng cửa hội trường. Chúng tôi đã đợi ở sảnh vào
trong mười phút khi ba trong số các thành viên ban nhạc bước ra. Họ
rất vui mừng khi gặp chúng tôi, một trong số họ đã rất vui mừng đến nỗi anh ấy
đã rơi nước mắt. Chúng tôi cảm thấy rất ấm áp và gần gũi với mỗi
khác. Họ đưa chúng tôi trở lại hội trường và chúng tôi nói chuyện thoải mái. Chúng tôi
đã ở bên nhau khoảng một giờ và trong thời gian này, chúng tôi cảm thấy
rằng họ đã rất chân thành.

Quando ero in sei inferiore mi sono unito a un gruppo di interviste
intervistare il pubblico in generale. Uno dei miei amici nel gruppo
ha perso la borsa ed era molto nervosa. Cinque di noi dovevano andare
un altro posto così l'abbiamo lasciata e abbiamo programmato di vederla più tardi. Poi
L'ho sentita descrivere come appariva la sua borsa. Ho capito che io
aveva visto la sua borsetta per terra e non aveva voluto farne
cosa a riguardo.

கடந்த வாரம் நான் டென்னிஸ் விளையாட திட்டமிட்டிருந்தேன், டென்னிஸ் முன்பதிவு செய்திருந்தேன்
நீதிமன்றம். இருப்பினும் நான் பல்கலைக்கழக ஜிம்மிற்கு வந்தபோது எழுத்தர்
நீதிமன்றம் பாடங்களுக்கு பயன்படுத்தப்படுவதாக என்னிடம் கூறினார்.

Несколько дней назад я ждал автобус на остановке.
Прежде чем сесть в автобус, я приготовил точное количество
монет, чтобы заплатить за автобусную ярмарку, и когда я сел в автобус, я положил
эти монеты в ящик, предназначенный для сбора автобусной ярмарки. я
думал, что заплатил и хотел попасть внутрь. Однако
Водитель автобуса позвонил мне и невежливо спросил, не
застряли при открытии коробки. Он не видел, чтобы я платил
а в ящике не было стопки монет. Я не мог
понял это, и водитель все время расспрашивал меня. Он заставил меня
злиться и наконец я вставил долларовую монету в коробку просто
уйти от него. Позже я обнаружил, что забыл несколько
монет в кармане и не заплатил достаточно за ярмарку в первый
время. После того, как я вошел в автобус, я все еще мог его слышать
ругал меня, и мне стало противно.

कुछ दिन पहले मेरे पास एक ट्यूटोरियल क्लास और शिक्षक बेतरतीब ढंग से थे
प्रत्येक समूह में एक व्यक्ति को प्रस्तुति देने के लिए नियुक्त किया।
हमारे समूह में चर्चा और प्रस्तुति भ्रमित हो गई थी
बहुत अच्छी तरह से तैयार नहीं था। दुर्भाग्य से मुझे चुना गया
वर्तमान और मैं शांत नहीं रह सके, भ्रमित थे और परिणाम था
बहुत गरीब। मुझे सच में शर्म आ रही थी।

Después de ver una película de terror, Omen. No pude dormir por la noche

su rostro y pensé que me elegiría a mí.

sentait qu'il ne me respectait pas et de plus j'étais son ami alors

J'étais alors de mauvaise humeur).

Senti coupable.

日本の異文化交流プログラムの申し込みは

リストが宣言されていました。私はボードに走って、自分が

一日。クラスメートや友達に会ったとき、
良い知らせ。私は私のことに集中できなかったのでとても幸せでした
研究。

In passato pensavo che mia madre fosse molto fastidiosa
